content: in this court case in torino the court ruled in favor of ma who is the spouse of the deceased ma was granted a larger share of the property specifically a 69 share because of the importance of the family residence the court also discussed the calculation of the adjustment and the allocation of costs ma was ordered to pay 10500 euros to the other parties involved fg fc and fp who already owned a 19 share of the property the property in question is located in venaria and includes a firstfloor apartment with three bedrooms a dining room a kitchenette two bathrooms two balconies a cellar basement and a portion of the attic the court declared that the litigation costs will be fully offset by the parties involved with ma responsible for 775 of the courtappointed expert witness costs and fg fc and fp responsible for 75 the final ruling was made on june 30 2009 by the judge
